greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = least k >= 1 such that the remainder when 6^k is divided by k is n.
link: Robert G. Wilson v, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000 with -1 for those entries where a(n) has not yet been found
results.author: _Alexander Adamchuk_, Jan 30 2007, Feb 05 2007
ext: a(5) <= 4021227877 from Joe K. Crump (joecr(AT)carolina.rr.com), Feb 10 2007
